EventSettings.name: EventSettings
EventSettings.label: Event Settings
EventSettings.description: Represents EventSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableApexLimitEvents.description: enable Apex Limit Events field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableDeleteMonitoringData.description: enable Delete Monitoring Data field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableDynamicStreamingChannel.description: enable Dynamic Streaming Channel field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableEventLogWaveIntegration.description: enable Event Log Wave Integration field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableLoginForensics.description: enable Login Forensics field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableStreamingApi.description: enable Streaming Api field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableTerminateOldestSession.description: enable Terminate Oldest Session field of EventSettings metadata component.

enableTransactionSecurityPolicies.description: enable Transaction Security Policies field of EventSettings metadata component.
